title: Google Cloud strikes near $10B AI cybersecurity deal with Palo Alto Networks, its largest security deal yet
description: Alphabet’s cloud computing unit has secured its largest security deal to date, striking a nearly $10 billion agreement with Palo Alto Networks that deepens a partnership first formed in 2018, the two companies announced Friday. title: ‘A singularly turbulent time’: Deeper uncertainty in store for global economy
description: Transformational changes continue to rattle the global economy, including the revolution in artificial intelligence, rapidly aging populations, climate change, and a worldwide turn against liberal democracy and a rules-based international order
content:
Despite being swatted about like a tetherball by ever-shifting trade wars, shortages of critical minerals and tense standoffs between the United States and China, the global economy has turned out to be more resilient than predicted.

title: Massive $10 Billion AI Security Pact Between Google Cloud and Palo Alto Networks
description: Google Cloud and Palo Alto Networks announce an expanded $10 billion deal focused on artificial intelligence security services. The partnership will see Palo Alto migrate to Google’s platform and enhance AI-driven offerings. The deal highlights AI's increasing role in cybersecurity amid evolving threats.
content: In a landmark deal, Google Cloud and cybersecurity giant Palo Alto Networks have unveiled a substantial $10 billion partnership focused on enhancing artificial intelligence security services. A source has described it as Google Cloud's largest-ever s... [554 chars]

title: AI To Create New Job Opportunities as Over 8.6 Lakh Candidates Trained In Emerging Technologies, Parliament Informed

title: This is how Zara is using AI to stay ahead in the fast-fashion race
description: Zara has quietly joined the growing list of fashion brands experimenting with artificial intelligence, and it’s already stirring conversation. The fas.
content: Zara is now using AI to digitally alter model images, showcasing new outfits without costly reshoots. This move, mirrored by H&M and Zalando, aims for faster visual production. While brands assure AI complements human roles and respects model consent... [3221 chars]

title: AI investment enhances work for Canada

content:

title: MeritTrac Celebrates 25 Years with a Conference on the Future of Talent and AI
description: Bengaluru (Karnataka) [India], December 19: MeritTrac Services, India's leading talent assessment and examination management company, celebrated its 25th anniversary with a high-impact industry conference titled 'Reimagining Talent 2025: Unlocking People & Possibilities in an AI Era.' The event, organised in collaboration with People Matters, brought together senior leaders from academia, HR, and technology to explore how artificial intelligence is transforming talent assessment, development, and workforce capabilities.
